local_intent: Align to the visible grape, execute pick using precomputed grasp key, then verify grasp stability.
assumptions: grape_grasp was computed earlier and is valid
Tool yaw and approach posture are already set for pinch grasp
coherence_with_global: Implements the grasp phase: confirm visibility and grasp pose, align (tolerance 0.005, 1200 ms), perform Pick with grasp_key grape_grasp and verify stability, matching the GLOBAL_BT semantics.
